dct_title_s: Planisphaer. ter. cum glob[o] coel et terr. et sph[aer] armil. et
dct_description_sm: Gezeichnet von J. A. Richtern; Gestochen von Bernigeroth
California shown as a labeled island with an indented northern coast. M. CALIFORNE to the west.
Title on scroll, obscured by map insets.
Includes 10 labeled figures. Fig I & II are the two hemispheres of the world. Figures III to VII are along the top of map, and Figures VIII to X are on bottom.
"TAB. I. GEOGRAPHIA et ASTRONOMIA." at top center. "Gezeichnet von J.A. Richtern 1738." at bottom left. "Gestochen von Bernigeroth in Leipzig 1741." at bottom right.
